description: System-generated unique identifier for a driver-to-equipment assignment record.
System date-time when the assignment record was created or last updated (likely in yyyymmddhhmmssmmm format).
Effective date for the driver’s assignment change (start of this record’s validity).
Narrative or code explaining why the assignment changed (e.g., transfer, maintenance); confirm with SME.
Alternate starting meter reading for the asset at assignment start (e.g., hubometer or secondary counter); confirm with SME.
Primary odometer reading at the start of the driver’s assignment.
Alternate ending meter reading for the asset at assignment end (secondary counter); confirm with SME.
Primary odometer reading at the end of the driver’s assignment.
Identifier of the equipment/vehicle assigned to the driver for this record.
Reference qualifier indicating the master data target for the equipment identifier (foreign key metadata).
Identifier of the equipment previously assigned before this change took effect.
Reference qualifier for the previous equipment identifier (foreign key metadata).
Identifier for an additional or driven unit linked to the driver during this period (e.g., trailer); confirm with SME.
Reference qualifier for the additional/secondary equipment identifier (foreign key metadata).
Identifier of the driver (employee) associated with this assignment record.
Reference qualifier indicating the master data target for the driver identifier (employee master).
Key value from the legacy source system used for lineage and cross-system mapping.
Name of the legacy source table from which this record originated.
Fourth starting meter reading captured at assignment start (auxiliary counter); confirm with SME.
Third starting meter reading captured at assignment start (auxiliary counter); confirm with SME.
Fourth ending meter reading captured at assignment end (auxiliary counter); confirm with SME.
Third ending meter reading captured at assignment end (auxiliary counter); confirm with SME.
